meanings.sent1: The overscaled chair looked comically big in the tiny room.
meanings.sent2: The overscaled painting overwhelmed the small wall it was hung on.
meanings.sent3: The overscaled hat made him look like a walking circus tent.
meanings.sent4: Her overscaled enthusiasm for the project was infectious.
meanings.sent5: The overscaled mountain in the painting seemed to tower over the entire landscape.

meanings.sent1: The overscaled flower in the garden drew everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: Her overscaled reaction to the news surprised everyone.
meanings.sent3: The overscaled cake at the party was bigger than the table!
meanings.sent4: His overscaled fear of spiders made him jump at the tiniest bug.
meanings.sent5: The overscaled shadow of the tree stretched across the entire yard.
